name: HaikuReader
0:
”Alexa, launch Haiku Reader”
”Alexa, ask Haiku Reader to tell me a poem”
”Alexa, tell Haiku Reader to read me something”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: haiku reader
des: Having trouble to find good stories to tell your kids at bedtime ? No worries Haiku Reader is here to help you with that. Haiku Reader will read beautiful short Japanese poems to your kids.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
